page.title: 07The Uyeasound Hamefarers.
page.content: The word Hamefarin means Homecoming. The last Hamefarin was in 1960. For the 1985 Hamefarin several people came from all over the world to Uyeasound.I asked one of the Hamefarers a few questions.He had come from New Zealand and had not come to the last Hamefarin.Born in Shetland,he still has relatives here.He left for employment when he was young and prefers the weather where he lives now. Some special events were arranged for the Hamefarers in Uyeasound.There was a Craft Sale where teas were served.There was a guided tour around Muness Castle.One evening some of the Hamefarers flew low over Uyeasound on a pleasure flight.They went to Britain's most northerly point,Muckle Flugga Lighthouse and then rose higher to view the whole of Shetland.
